import { Props, Playground } from "docz"
import Text from './index'
Text component that wraps Chakra Text Component

// Override the base styles using the `override` prop
<Text override={}/>

<Playground>
  <Text override={{color: "whatsapp.500"}}>Color Override</Text>
  <Text.Body1 override={{fontSize: "6xl"}}>Font Size Override</Text.Body1>
  <Text.Body2 override={{m: "8"}}>Margin Override</Text.Body2>
  <Text.Body3 override={{fontWeight: "black"}}>Font Weight Override</Text.Body3>
</Playground>
